name: Mini Golf (utas-llf)
description:
Controls
1-0 : Levels 1-10
R : Title
Left-click : Charge hit
Shift/Space : Boost

Features

  • Ball aiming and shooting
  • Ball aiming line
  • Ball sunk (display end level text + loading next scene)
  • Ball reset when offscreen
  • Ball stopping when touching ground at low speed
  • Nice visual style ;)
  • Turbo boost (2x speed, 0.5s per use)
  • Divot particles when ball shot
  • Trail (changes during boost)
  • Post processing (light bloom giving it a more outdoor feel)
  • Ball shot sound effect (one of two sounds, volume depending on hit strength) + landing sound (volume depending on speed)
  • Music (loops, doesn't stop or restart on level change)
  • and 10 complete levels

Note: Think the only feature left out is level 3 aiming look-ahead

References

  • Tilesheet
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349
  • Font
    • https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Silkscreen
  • Golf ball hit
    • https://freesound.org/people/zolopher/sounds/75206/
    • https://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/sounds/98334/
  • Golf ball land
    • https://freesound.org/people/onehugeeye/sounds/511318/
  • Music
    • https://opengameart.org/content/town-theme-rpg
